data.label: Easy Mobile
data.description: Easy Mobile 是一个多合一的 Unity 包，大大简化了移动游戏的标准功能的实现，包括广告、应用内购买、游戏服务、通知和本机移动功能。

data.label: Easy Mobile
data.description: Easy Mobile is an all-in-one Unity package that greatly simplifies the implementation of de facto standard features of mobile games including advertising, in-app purchasing, game service, notification, and native mobile functionalities.
